name: GetGot!
description:
GetGot! The latest and greatest from Group Name Game Description

Get your friends while trying not to get got.
Play as a triangle and launch yourself towards your friend. Colliding at high speeds leads to explosive results!

Controls:
Player 1 (Red) - WASD to move, G to slash/launch
Player 2 (Blue) - Arrows to move, PERIOD to slash/launch

Dev Build Link: https://shovelsquid.github.io/GetGot/

Team Members

Kaelen Cook - Art
Jasha Puzon - Sound
Cameron West - Programming
